Hero.Title: Hi, I'm Yogita Gami
Hero.Tagline: An Aspiring MERN Stack Developer with a passion for creating innovative web applications.
Hero.Introduction: I specialize in building full-stack applications using MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, and Node.js. My journey in tech is fueled by curiosity and a desire to solve real-world problems through code.

About.Heading: I am a Master of Science graduate in Computer Science with Data Science, scoring an SGPA of 8.86 from Vikram University, Ujjain. Over the years, I have honed my skills in full-stack development, data visualization, and machine learning.

Skills_Summary.Libraries_and_Frameworks: React.js, Tailwind CSS, Express.js, Next.js, Django

GetMeAChai.Description: A Patreon-like platform built with the MERN stack and Next.js, enabling content creators to monetize their work.
GetMeAChai.Features: User authentication, creator dashboards, real-time updates, Fund creators directly to support their content
GetMeAChai.Technologies Used: React.js, Next.js, Tailwind CSS, Post CSS, Razorpay, MongoDB

Business Location Recommendation System.Description: A web application that assists entrepreneurs in identifying high-potential areas for business using clustering algorithms.
Business Location Recommendation System.Features: User Authentication, Business Insights, Location Identification, Interactive Mapping
Business Location Recommendation System.Technologies Used: Python (scikit-learn), Geopy, Foursquare API, Folium, Django, MySQL

Password Manager.Description: A secure web application for managing and storing user credentials with an intuitive interface and encrypted backend.
Password Manager.Features: Manage passwords, Real-time notifications, Encrypted password storage
Password Manager.Technologies Used: React.js, Vite, Tailwind CSS, Node.js, Express.js, Mongoose

TodoList.Description: A task management application that allows users to organize and manage their daily tasks effectively.
TodoList.Features: Task management with CRUD operations, Task completion marking, Persistent storage using local storage

Spotify.Description: A visually appealing Spotify-inspired music streaming web application designed to mimic Spotify's interface and functionalities.
Spotify.Features: Playlist sections,Dynamic album display for user interaction, Responsive design

Twitter.Description: A visually accurate clone of the Twitter interface, designed to replicate its layout and responsiveness.
Twitter.Features: Fully responsive design, Interactive hover effects and transitions
